měi

媄字的汉语字典释义

[①]［měi］
［《廣韻》無鄙切，上旨，明。］
美；柔美。

媄字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　媄； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页266第17
【廣韻】無鄙切【集韻】毋鄙切，?音美。【說文】色美也。【六書故】媺又作媄，音義同。

[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　媄; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 266-17
[Guangyun] No contemptible cut [Jiyun] No contemptible cut, beautiful sound. [Said the text] Color is also beautiful. [Six Book History] The young woman has the same pronunciation and meaning.
